Text.val: email eng : 1, pake magic, 2. pake php , 3. PAKE CMAIL

ExpSyntax.val: 'Sending Email Error! Please Contact IT Dept'
Trim({0,3})&ASCIIChr(13)&ASCIIChr(10)&ASCIIChr(13)&ASCIIChr(10)&'This is automatic email from Level Up System. Dont Reply !!!'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select m.gcm_id,m.description from SYS_GCM as m where m.condition =':1' AND m.gcm_id like 'EMAIL_%'
